title: Facebook could someday pay an Apple-like dividend, says co-founder of social network forerunner
text: Divya Narendra, co-founder of Harvard Connection, a forerunner to Facebook, says he thinks Facebook will also use its $52 billion cash on hand for additional acquisitions.

title: Facebook sues ILikeAd, alleges ad fraud
text: Facebook Inc  on Thursday sued a Hong Kong company that it said baited people into clicking on celebrities' photos and bogus advertising links, so it could install malware and run ads for counterfeit goods, diet pills and male enhancement supplements.

title: Facebook sues Chinese ad company over alleged hacking campaign
text: In its lawsuit, Facebook accused two Chinese citizens of hacking people's accounts and using their victims' money to run fraudulent ads, costing them $4 million in damages.

title: 3 Mega-Cap Stocks Worth Long-Term Bets
text: Through thick and thin there are a few mega-cap stocks to own for the long term. This means ignoring the short-term noise from headlines.

title: Nearly 40% of Facebook's valuation is on the line from regulatory risk, HSBC says
text: Regulators from the U.S. and abroad have flagged privacy, regulatory and antitrust risks of the social media giant.

title: Facebook stock rises after Stifel says it's a buy
text: Shares of Facebook Inc.  are up 0.6% in premarket trading Thursday after Stifel analyst John Egbert turned bullish on the stock, upgrading it from buy to hold and raising his target price to $240 from $215.

title: Facebook and Alphabet upgraded by Stifel on advertising optimism
text: "We expect online advertising to eclipse 60% of U.S. ad spend in the next 5 years," said Stifel.

title: Facebook Wants to Compete With Everyone
text: The social networking company is experimenting with a slew of apps across numerous new categories.
